meanings.definition: Presenting or bringing something into a place or group for the first time.
meanings.sent1: The introducing toy was shiny and new.
meanings.sent2: The introducing book caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The introducing cake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The introducing sunlight brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The introducing puppy was full of energy.

meanings.definition: Making someone known to another by name.
meanings.sent1: She was introducing her friend to the teacher.
meanings.sent2: He is introducing himself to the new neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The parrot kept introducing itself to everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The magician was introducing his assistant to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide was introducing the historical figures to the visitors.
